snippet.title: Apotheorasis • Lab of the Blind Gods | Launch Trailer (Audio Game - Use Headphones !)
snippet.description:
Apotheorasis is an audio-only first person shooter where you... WHAT!? An FPS without graphics!? Yes.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1694670/
https://tallguyprods.itch.io/apotheorasis

Run • Blast • Dodge • Die, as you Challenge your makers to become the labrat *cough* God you were always meant to be. Close your Eyes, put on your Headphones, and let 3D Audio immerse you in this dark, twisted - and badly humorous - sci-fi world.
